title: Isle Royale National Park: Permits & Reservations
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Permits & Reservations               Permits & Reservations        View of Rock Harbor Channel from the deck of the Ranger III ferry.    Â    Isle Royale National Park offers an array of recreational activities, but some may require a permit or reservation.   Permits   A backcountry/camping permit is required for all who stay overnight in the campgrounds, at dock, or who anchor out.   Rock Harbor Lodge & Windigo Camper Cabins The Rock Harbor Lodge complex, located on the northeast end of Isle Royale National Park, is the only full-service lodging facility on the island.  There are two rustic camper cabins available for rent in Windigo on the southwest end of the island.   Group Camping-Parties of Seven to Ten Advance reservations are required for groups of seven to ten individuals, including leaders.   Boater Camping Request Boaters can submit requests for campsites, anchorages, and dock space.   Cross-Country Camping Cross-country camping is intended for those seeking a higher level of solitude, adventure, self-sufficiency, and low impact camping in a wilderness setting.
